description.narrative:
Denna insats övergripande mål är att stödja utvecklingen av en interaktiv och skalbar webbsida där Colombias framsteg inom ramen för FN:s globala hållbarhetsmål följs upp. Detta ska ske genom att stärka den digitala instrumentbräda som formgavs i fas 1.
Fas 1 resulterade i en digital plattform med syfte att synliggöra uppfyllandet av de globala hållbarhetsmålen i Colombia. Struktur, logik och metodik utformades i enlighet med IOM:s krav, det nationella planeringskontorets DNP:s behov, nationella statistikbyrån DANE:s tillgängliga information och svenska ambassadens kriterier. Plattformen (fas 1) är dock en prototyp som kräver vidareutveckling och förstärkning för att kunna bli ett webbaserat verktyg som ger regeringen möjlighet att övervaka varje enskilt hållbarhetsmål, och som ger colombianer tillgång till data grundat på en princip om öppen förvaltning.

This contribution's overall objective is to contribute to the development of an interactive and scalable website to follow up on Colombia's progress in relation to the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) by strengthening the digital dashboard prototype designed in Phase I.
The result of the first phase was a digital platform to visualize the achievement of the SDGs in Colombia. Its structure, logic, and methodology were designed according to IOM´s requirements, NPD needs, DANE's available information and the Swedish Embassy´s criteria. This digital platform (Phase 1) is, however, a prototype that needs to be further developed and needs to be strengthened in order to become an interactive web-based tool that allows the government to monitor each SDG and the Colombian population to have access on an open-government basis. This will be the overall objective of Phase 2.

This contribution's overall objective is to contribute to the development of an interactive and scalable website to follow up on Colombia's progress in relation to the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) by strengthening the digital dashboard prototype designed in Phase I. Specifically, this second’s phase objective was to continue with the start-up of the tool, which seeks to develop the operating system, the design of the contents and the data processing of the site, as well as the transfer of the administration from Colombia’s statistical department (DANE) and the National Planning Department (DNP). This phaseis executed in partnership with Data Act Lab, Swedish firm responsible for thedesign of the initial prototype. The web page's address is www.ods.gov.co/en

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative: The results/products received were: 1. Scalable website using the latest web standards that allow the updating of data and information, including additional sets of data and indicators: 4 sections that encompass the 17 SDG and 145 sub-indicators,compliance analysis for the 32 departments, analysis of compliance gaps for each SDG. 2. User manual and installation manual delivered. 3. Knowledge transfer strategy and delivery training of the tool formulated and implemented.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
